_addLiquidity(StrategyQsWmaticUsdc,uint2.notice: ActionType: ADD_LIQUIDITY Add liquidity to qs pool: [wmatic, usdc] -> qs lpToken

_removeLiquidity(StrategyQsWmaticUsdc,ui.notice: ActionType: REMOVE_LIQUIDITY Remove liquidity from qs pool: qs lpToken -> [wmatic, usdc]

_swapUsdPlusToUsdc(StrategyQsWmaticUsdc,.notice: ActionType: SWAP_USDPLUS_TO_ASSET Swap on exchange usdPlus -> usdc

_swapUsdcToUsdPlus(StrategyQsWmaticUsdc,.notice: ActionType: SWAP_ASSET_TO_USDPLUS Swap on exchange usdc -> usdPlus

_swapUsdcToWmatic(StrategyQsWmaticUsdc,u.notice: ActionType: SWAP_ASSET_TO_TOKEN Swap on UniswapV3 usdc -> wmatic

_swapWmaticToUsdc(StrategyQsWmaticUsdc,u.notice: ActionType: SWAP_TOKEN_TO_ASSET Swap on UniswapV3 wmatic -> usdc
